glsa.title: mpg123: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: An error in mpg123 might allow for the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: mpg123 is a realtime MPEG 1.0/2.0/2.5 audio player for layers 1, 2 and 3.

description.p: The vendor reported a signedness error in the store_id3_text() function in id3.c, allowing for out-of-bounds memory access.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open an MPEG-1 Audio Layer 3 (MP3) file containing a specially crafted ID3 tag, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
